The AWS CloudFormation template for this Serverless application

C:\\Users\\youni\\Documents\\NUST\\Cloud.serviceRawFile:
# "org" ensures this Service is used with the correct Serverless Framework Access Key.
org: personal116
service: serverless-chatbot

provider:
  name: aws
  runtime: nodejs18.x
  region: us-east-1
  stage: dev
  environment:
    DB_USER: postgres
    DB_HOST: database-1.cgdco0e6wg3a.us-east-1.rds.amazonaws.com
    DB_NAME: postgres
    DB_PASSWORD: tqahCJXW3fH9Q3h
    DB_PORT: 5432
    BEDROCK_REGION: us-east-1
  iam:
    role:
      statements:
        - Effect: Allow
          Action:
            - bedrock:InvokeModel
            - bedrock-runtime:InvokeModel
          Resource: "arn:aws:bedrock:*::foundation-model/*"

functions:
  app:
    handler: index.handler
    events:
      - http:
          path: /
          method: ANY
          cors: true
      - http:
          path: /{proxy+}
          method: ANY
          cors: true
    timeout: 29
    memorySize: 256

plugins:
  - serverless-offline

custom:
  serverless-offline:
    httpPort: 3000
